comment: Ergh what a shrew! Print this and post it all over the place. We need to start doing that with all these self-righeous POSs; shove their hypocrisy and lunacy in the public's face.
amr:
# ::snt Ergh what a shrew! Print this and post it all over the place. We need to start doing that with all these self-righeous POSs; shove their hypocrisy and lunacy in the public's face.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / shrew
            :degree (s2 / so)
            :mod (e / ergh
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (p / print-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / this))
            :op2 (p2 / post-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 t
                  :ARG2 (a2 / all-over
                        :op1 (p3 / place))))
      :snt3 (n / need-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (s3 / start-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (d / do-02
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (t2 / that)
                        :ARG2 (p4 / person
                              :ARG0-of (s4 / shit-01
                                    :mod (s5 / sexist))
                              :mod (t3 / this)
                              :mod (a3 / all)))))
      :snt4 (s6 / shove-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (h / hypocrisy)
                  :op2 (l / lunacy))
            :ARG2 (f / face
                  :part-of (p5 / public))))
